name: 2014 special Hidden Objects
description:
Welcome to Newyear 2014

2014 Special Hidden Objects

We wish you happy new year.

New search game from known series.

new year is coming! Feel the magic of new year in your phone through very entertaining hidden object game.

Go through each level, find hidden Santa Claus,Newyear gifts, stars, Christmas tree and discover beautiful festival world.

If you like this game , this application is for you as well.

When you searching hidden object be quick and careful to avoid missed attempts.
Repeat levels as many as You want.

wrong Touch will you decrease your score board in game center.

Enjoy 2014 Special Hidden objects games..

if you like it. check out our other hidden objects games.
